results.title: AMPK in BCR-ABL expressing leukemias. Regulatory effects and therapeutic implications
results.text_hl: The potential for future clinical-translational applications of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activators such as AICAR, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@ for the treatment of @DISEASE_Leukemia_Myelogenous_Chronic_BCR_ABL_Positive @DISEASE_MESH:D015464 @@@chronic myelogenous leukemia@@@ (@DISEASE_Leukemia_Myelogenous_Chronic_BCR_ABL_Positive @DISEASE_MESH:D015464 @@@CML@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Precursor_Cell_Lymphoblastic_Leukemia_Lymphoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054198 @@@Ph+ acute lymphoblastic leukemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Precursor_Cell_Lymphoblastic_Leukemia_Lymphoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054198 @@@ALL@@@) are discussed.

results.title: The antileukemia effect of metformin in the Philadelphia chromosome-positive leukemia cell line and patient primary leukemia cell.
results.text_hl: Overall, our data suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ represents a promising and attractive agent for @<m>DISEASE_Precursor_Cell_Lymphoblastic_Leukemia_Lymphoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054198 @@@Ph+ALL@@@ or @DISEASE_Leukemia_Myelogenous_Chronic_BCR_ABL_Positive @DISEASE_MESH:D015464 @@@CML@@@ therapy.

results.title: A phase I window, dose escalating and safety trial of metformin in combination with induction chemotherapy in relapsed refractory acute lymphoblastic leukemia: Metformin with induction chemotherapy of vincristine, dexamethasone, PEG-asparaginase, and doxorubicin.
